explains: v. 稀释，冲淡；削弱，降低；稀释股权；使（颜色）变淡，褪（色）；以一定比例的非熟练工替代（熟练工）
adj. 稀释了的，冲淡了的；减弱了的，淡化了的；（颜色）褪了的
wordGroup: dilute with 用…冲淡；用…稀释

sentences.en: There was a clear intention to dilute black voting power.
sentences.cn: 削弱黑人选举权的意图是显而易见的。

sentences.en: Dilute the paint with water until it is the consistency of milk.
sentences.cn: 用水把颜料稀释到牛奶的黏稠度。

sentences.en: If you give your baby juice, dilute it well with cooled, boiled water.
sentences.cn: 喂婴儿果汁要用凉开水充分稀释。
